description:
- Limited time on SALES only
- Get it before the price raise up!!!

*** App of the Day ***
Top Overall in 25 countries
Top Utility in 58 countries
If you want to protect your documents from spying eyes, then iSafe is for you. This app is like a real safe for your iPhone, locked away with. special code. And you even hide Top Secret stuff from extra curious, like girlfriends, by giving them a fake code that only allows them to see certain content-sneaky ;) An app that could just save your life!


Powerful functions combined into 1 app: 
1) Photos Safe
2) Videos Safe 
3) USB Drive
4) Music Player
5) Facebook Transfer 
6) Youtube Transfer 
7) Files Downloader
8) Ringtone Maker
9) Files Sharing 
10) Powerful Video Player
11) Powerful Images, Musics & Videos Downloader
12) Video to Music Converter
13) Unzip & Unrar
14) Text Editor
15) Audio Recorder
16) Security Browser
17) Live TV
18) CCTV


Awesome Features: 
1. Passcode & Fakecode 
You can unlock the app by using either passcode or fakecode. 
Passcode: Both unlocked and locked items will be shown 
Fakecode: Only unlocked items will be shown 
Confidential: Enter the passcode, pull down and refresh to show the confidential directories.
So, enter the fakecode if your girlfriend asks you to unlock iSafe.

2. Login Styles
You can choose many unlock tricks, such as 4 numeric password, 9 dots lock, or disguise as piano, xylophone, ATM…

3. Best Organization 
All files will be assigned to three categories: Photos, Movies and Docs. 
You can create locked albums, movie clips or directories in each categories. 

4. Powerful Downloader
- Images: Download all images from a webpage by one step. 
- Musics
- Videos
- any files

5. Powerful Video Player
iSafe can play almost all formats of video, no need to convert anymore.

6. Music Player 
You can directly download the music from the legal website without sync with iTunes.
Music videos can be added into music playlist, listen without any conversion.

7. Video to Music Converter
You can grab the sound tracks from MTV files (mp4, m4v & 3gp). So as to save the disk space and listen the songs in the background.

8. Facebook Connect 
- download the albums and videos from your friends
- create album and multi-upload photos 
- Multi-upload videos 

9. Youtube API 
Multi-upload videos to youtube. 

10. Live TV
Watch the popular TV channels in the world.

11. CCTV
Connect to your webcam. (mms, rtsp)

12. Ringtone Maker 
Trim any audio file into 40 seconds ringtone. 

13. Files Sharing
Share your files via Email, MMS, Bluetooth, WiFi…

14. Spy Tools:
- Turn on the camera in the login page for immediately needed.
- Turn on the light in the login page immediately for the spy tasks in dark.
- Take a picture of the intruder with the front camera when entered wrong passcode every two times.
- Hidden camera in the left side menu. No one will see when the camera is recording. 

15. Minors
- subfolders
- text editor
- file browser
- download files by using URL Scheme
- extract zip and rar files
- compress files
- connect to external screen
- continue playing songs and videos in background
- audio control in lock screen
- assign image into contact book


Supports Various File Formats
- Images: png, jpg, jpeg, bmp, tif, gif
- Videos: mp4, mov, m4v, 3gp, flv, f4v, mpg, mpeg, wmv, rmvb, mkv, asf, webm
- Audios: mp3, m4a, m4r, aac, caf, wma
- Plain Text: txt, php, cgi, asp, h, m, c (editable)
- Rich Text: rtf, pdf
- iWorks: pages, numbers, key
- MS Office: doc, xls, ppt, docx, xlsx, pptx
- Web: htm, html, webarchive
- Archive: zip, rar
- Others: …… (unreadable, save only)


Multi-language: more then 20 languages, including Hindi, Persian.

More and more features are coming. Get it now! 


(We are hiring, please visit: http://awesapp.com)
releaseNotes:
